transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Yaar ye beech ke call defect ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Bas main ye keh rahi hu aap use kariye aapko lagta hai ki haan mujhe benefit mil raha hai then we will review over the basic service renewal of TrustSeal sir. First of all hum abhi service parameter pe hi dekhte hain jo maine aapko jis tarike se guide kiya hai. Thik hai? Kyunki main jo dekh rahi thi beshak aap bata rahe ho ki unke comparison mein aapko achcha business nahi mil raha hai. Lekin jo main abhi agar aapko koi ye suggest karta hai ki preferred star buylead ke liye package hai to wo galat suggestion hai sir. Preferred star hamesha hum aapko promotion aur ranking ke liye dete hain. Ji.
Customer: Suniye mam aapke jo pehle jisne plan becha tha na mam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai? Usne mam main bhi bewakoof nahi hu jo isliye keval isiliye le lunga us plan ko. Usne mere se kaha tha ki sir aapko na kam se kam 20 inquiry daily ka itna badhiya milega ki aapka matlab business yaha se waha pahunch jayega.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jab usne ye bola tabhi to liya tha na mam maine.
Executive: Sneha Sharma se baat hui thi na aapki?
Customer: Ab kisi se bhi hui ho mam jo bhi tha aapka banda usne aise hi bola tha mere se. Aur ek baar nahi kam se kam hazar baar bola tha ki sir aap ek baar leke to dekhiye dekhiye.
Executive: Anamika Kumari. Okay. Anamika Kumari se aapka payment karaya tha.
Customer: Dekhiye na aap kya kya wade kiye the unhone aur bilkul fir uske baad.
Executive: Main manti hu ye galat hai sir agar koi aapko ye suggest karta hai na agar main bhi aapko kahu ki sir preferred star mein buylead bahut jyada hai ki.
Customer: Jab mera plan activate hua tha to mere se ye bola gaya sir abhi ek do mahine mein aapka plan dheere dheere activate hoga uske baad aapke pass lead aana start hongi. Thik hai mam main wait karta gaya main ek mahine wait kiya do mahine wait kiya mam main aise thodi na char mahine pure nikal chuke ab kya plan bhi kuch hai kitne mahine mein mahine mein expire ho jayega.
Executive: Haan wo bhi main dekh rahi hu aapki na wo bhi dekhte aayenge.
Customer: To fir kya matlab hua aapka lene ka aadhe saal to aapne aise nikal diye. Aadhe saal aise nikal diya aapne.
Executive: ROI mein dikkat nahi aayegi sir lekin bas wahi hota hai ki commitment kaise de rahe hain person pe depend karta hai ki wo kis tarike se aapko product bacha ke unhone becha. Product kharab nahi hai product bahut achcha hai kyunki aap hi ke category mein ek aur competitor hai. Delhi ka hai I guess aap jante honge nahi Ahmedabad ka hai ye. Aapka ye jo hai futuristic climate control hai Siri instruments hai. In logo ka pure all over India mein industrial leader preferred leader chal raha hai sir. Jinka saal ka investment 20 se 25 lakh rupaye IndiaMART pe. To business hai aap hi ke keywords mein deal kar rahe hain wo bhi. Lekin bas wahi hota hai ki jo aapka ek expectation tha wo fulfill nahi ho paya hai abhi. But iska matlab ye nahi hai ki wo aage bhi fulfill nahi ho payega sir.
Executive: Thoda sa yahi hai ki jo chahiye tha aapko nahi mil paya. Aur ek bari hum ispe dekhte hain sir proper tarike se kaam karke. Main aapko whatsapp pe message karti hu jo bhi buylead aap 80% se jyada fake batate ho uska detail mujhe bhejo. So that main directly us customer pe call karti rahu apne end se bhi. Aur ek baar jo buylead pe maine aapko suggest kiya hai ki jahan pe customer ka detail jyada updated hai usi ko aap consume karna sir.
Executive: Baki sari buylead abhi aap chhod do for now.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Jo customer ne mobile number email address kyunki wo genuine hote hain sir. Maine ye feedback aapke competitor se hi liya tha jo aapke keywords mein. Unka jo employee tha wo isi tarike se buylead purchase karta tha. Pehle jo buylead uthata tha wo wo wali buylead pick karta tha jahan pe buyer ne apna email address bhi dala.
Customer: Main bhi pichle paanch saal se main main hi utha raha hu buylead main hi consume karta hu mere ko jab kuch galat cheez dikh rahi hai tabhi to main bol raha hu.
Executive: Aapko dikh rahi hai sir main manti hu aap itne purane 2019 se chala rahe ho bahut cheeze aapko matlab guide karne ki jarurat hai hi nahi. Aapka experience jo bata raha hai wahi keh rahe ho. But main jo abhi tak jo pichle last ek saal mein IndiaMART pe changes hue hain jo bhi algorithm mein uske basis pe main aapko bata rahi hu ki jo bhi buylead aapko agar purchase kar rahe ho na wo wahi buylead pick karo abhi jahan pe customer ne buyer detail mein sara detail dala aur kitna purana hai. Aapne to dekho sir member since likha hota hai buyer ka ki IndiaMART pe wo customer kitna purana hai usne kya kya detail dal rakha hai. Jitne naye customer hote hain wo sirf mobile number hi dalte hain unko sirf information janna hota hai IndiaMART ke through buylead aur inquiry ka price kya chal raha hai market mein.
Customer: Main bhi mobile number hi dalta hu mam.
Executive: Nahi sir aap post kabhi dekh lo.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hota sir ye to dekho.
Executive: Dekho aapke sare point se main agree karti hu lekin aisa kabhi nahi ho sakta jab tak customer na apna mobile number dal ke post nahi karega buylead generate nahi hoti hai. Aap khud bhi kabhi experience le lo.
Customer: Aap aap ye bol rahe ho na mobile number dal ke maine abhi mobile number kya mam aapka jab aap aapke agar app se koi customer aayega to aap bina bina mobile number ke to entry nahi karne dete wo to usko dalna hi padega mobile number.
Executive: Sir sir aap ek baat batao customer mobile number agar dal raha hai to usko requirement nahi hogi to kyun dalega. Main being a customer agar mujhe nahi chahiye pressure transmitter.
Customer: Dekhiye mam kai sare dekhiye mam kai sare research wale kai sare jo student hai wo keval apni knowledge ke liye mam cheezo ko dekhte hain thik hai. To ab uska matlab aap ek baar unhone agar chalo requirement dali to aapko ek baar confirm to karna chahiye sir aapko requirement hai kya nahi uske baad verification call jani chahiye ya nahi.
Executive: Verification call jati hai sir maine bhi ek requirement dala tha IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Verification call tak nahi aayi main abhi dekho aapki call mein aage mere pass inquiry.
Executive: Sir main batau maine mujhe na mujhe Muradabad ke customer se ek handicraft ka item chahiye tha pichle Diwali mein maine khud ek inquiry post kiya tha mere pass IndiaMART se call aayi thi hamari jo backend team hoti thi aapne is naam se ye inquiry dala aapko kitne piece ki requirement hai ye bhi unhone waha pe confirm kiya tha sir. To ye cheeze main khud experience karke dekh chuki hu ki aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Ye cheez pehle hoti thi main wahi bol raha hu ye cheez pehle hoti thi aaj ki date mein nahi ho rahi hai IndiaMART ke andar mam.
Executive: Ab to sir IndiaMART ne kafi jyada changes kiya hai google ke google google.
Customer: Main aapko bata raha hu pehle pehle ye cheez thi aapki IndiaMART backend team aapki verify karti thi uske pass lead ko post karti thi. But aaj ki date mein agar normally koi dekh bhi raha hai na to product wo lead ban ke chali jati hai buylead mein. Aur mere pass.
Executive: Customer jab search karte hain na ji.
Executive: Customer jab search karte hain ji ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Main bhi kuch dekhunga na to mere pass 50 jagah se call aayega sir aapka ye requirement.
Executive: Wo hota hai maine bhi maine bhi ek apne buyer apne customer ka IndiaMART pe catalog open kiya tha unke catalog mein main website mein changes kar rahi thi kuch. To mere naam ki inquiry unke pass chali gayi for example man lo main aapka website open kar rahi hu aur aapki website mein sare products ko main check kar rahi hu to meri naam ki inquiry aapke pass generate ho jayegi.
Customer: Nahi wo dekhiye catalog view pehle jo tha na aapka catalog view. Catalog view mein pehle wahi wahi log aate the catalog view dekh rahe hain aaj ki date mein to catalog view mein aa rahe hain wo bhi aap lead mein dal rahe ho.
Executive: Wo lead mein nahi dal rahe hain waha pe ye dikha raha hai ki buylead ye catalog view hai ya fir dekho abhi jaise aapke pass product aaya tha Fuji ye PXF9 aaya tha off temperature controller ke naam se isme yaha likha hua hai this might just a catalog view. Ye jo aapka ye buylead nahi hai ye catalog view hai wo usme buylead mein ye humne add kar diya aapka catalog view pehle bhi to aap sir pehle koi catalog view wagera consume karte the to buylead aapki waha se ek debit ho jati thi aapke buylead balance se.
Customer: To aapne mam wo catalog view bhi to band kar rakha hai aaj ki date mein pehle to catalog view mein free mein dekh lete the ki customer ka detail kya hai aaj ki date mein catalog view wala catalog view ka ek saal pehle tha do saal pehle nahi ek saal pehle aaj ki date mein catalog catalog view ka bhi detail dekhoge na to uske liye bhi aapko purchase karna padega buylead.
Executive: Wo buylead mein aa raha hai aapka this might be a catalog.
Customer: To wahi to main keh raha hu pehle catalog view mein mam matlab aap click karte the to waha pe mobile number aur email id dono cheeze.
Executive: Pehle kya hota tha pehle main batati hu catalog view mein kya hota tha koi customer agar aapka kuch seconds ke liye bhi catalog open kiya na wo aapke catalog views mein update ho jata tha aaj ke time pe aisa nahi hai koi bhi customer until unless aapke catalog pe one minute se jyada spend nahi karta hai wo catalog views mein add nahi karegi IndiaMART sir. Wo ek minute khol raha hai proper aapke catalog ko usse jyada tabhi wo catalog views mein add ho raha hai. Pehle aisa nahi tha pehle to koi customer click bhi kar diya to catalog views mein aa jata tha aapke wo genuine ho ya non genuine ho ye matter nahi karta tha us time pe. Isiliye humne buylead ke sath usko tie up kar diya aapka usme include kar diya ki customer jab tak aapke catalog ko proper visible nahi karta hai ek minute se jyada wo aapke catalog views mein add nahi hoga.
Executive: Kyunki iska bahut logo ko difference dekhne ko mila hai jitne bhi matlab other hamare IndiaMART pe clients hain unhone khud achcha feedback diya ki abhi ke catalog views mein mujhe conversion bhi milna start ho gaya hai. Ye cheeze main to be honest bata rahi hu sir aapko kyunki sir hum bhi daily basis pe 10 customer se to baat karti hi karte hain feedback ke liye services pe.
Executive: To thoda sa aapka aisa nahi hai ki issue resolve nahi ho sakta.
Customer: Thoda thoda to karke mera to pura time nikal diya aapne ab renew wala aa jayega kuch din mein time.
Executive: 10% achcha buylead aapko 10-15% bhi genuine nahi mil raha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Nahi mil raha.
Executive: Feedback wagera aapka achcha IndiaMART pe review wagera to kafi achcha hai buyer ka.
Customer: Ha wo kaun deta hai feedback kaha se dete hain mere ko batao na main dunga fir feedback kaise dete hain.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapka rating and review kafi achcha hai IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Customer ke through main aapki rating review ki baat kar rahi hu supplier rating aapka jo hota hai na jo customer ne aapko rating review diya IndiaMART pe wo kafi achcha hai matlab around 4.5.
Customer: Wo to mam bolte hain customer ko dene ke liye.
Executive: Achcha matlab order nahi fulfill hue inke sath koi.
Customer: Na.
Executive: Matlab Kashipur ka bhi customer hai Haryana ka customer hai in logo ne rating.
Customer: Request karte hain sir rating de dijiye shayad uski wajah se badh jaye aap hi unhone bataya tha ek IndiaMART walon ne.
Executive: Ek customer ek customer ne aapko ek customer ne to aapko do ka rating diya.
Customer: Sun to lijiye mam ab do ka diya hoga kisi purpose se aapke ek kisi sir ne bola tha aap customero se baat kiya kare rating badwaiye aapki aapka achcha hoga.
Executive: Hmm. Haan.
Executive: But ab to non genuine rating IndiaMART nahi wo kar rahi hai non genuine rating aapka remove ho jayega until unless usko aapne link nahi bheja aur buyer ne aapko order hone ke baad na diya ho pehle ye cheeze thi.
Customer: Link to bheja hi jayega tabhi to dega mam bina link ke kaise de dega.
Executive: Nahi kuch customer to sir aise bhi de dete hain na.
Customer: IndiaMART pe to wo de dete hain na.
Executive: Ab jaise man lo aapko ek buyer ne diya tha Irf Satvik naam tha Chittor Andhra Pradesh ka PIP temperature PID temperature controller ke liye diya tha iske sath aapka koi order final hua tha ya nahi isne aapko do ka rating diya tha sir.
Executive: Isne aapko negative rating diya tha.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan isne to aapko negative rating diya tha sir. Irf namit Satvik Andhra Pradesh ka tha ye.
Customer: Hoga koi.
Executive: To inko bhi sir aapne rating link bheja tha to obvious si baat hai inse to aapka koi discussion hua hoga na rating review ko lekar ke.
Customer: Mam nahi mam jaburi nahi hota rating to main aap bataiye kis company ko dena main leke de dunga.
Executive: Main wahi keh rahi hu rating sir buyer aapko aise bhi de sakta hai agar aap link nahi bhi share karoge to wahi cheeze main aapko bata rahi thi.
Customer: Main bhi bata raha hu.
Executive: Hmm. Koi nahi baki cheeze to matlab overall abhi achchi cheeze hain khair ki aapki rating bahut achchi hai kyunki agar other buyer aapke catalog ko dekhenge to ek positive note se dekhenge ki 4.5 ki rating hai to that might be ki supplier jo hai genuine hoga quality in terms mein aur baki cheezo mein aapko achcha rating hai sir kafi. Ispe ek baar main update kar deti hu sari cheeze.
Executive: Thik hai aur aapko main whatsapp pe ek baar message drop karti hu jo bhi hota hai sir aap mujhe ek detail bhejte rehna agar aapko lagta hai ki 20% bhi aapko buylead genuine mil rahi hai to wo kafi achcha hai sir. Kyunki bahut logo ko 20% bhi nahi mil pata hai genuine buylead.
Customer: Pehle feedback mein 20% mil raha tha but isme preferred star mein nahi milta.
Executive: 20% bhi nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Koi nahi ek baar aap mujhe sara detail bhejna thoda calls wagera dekho aap sir miss na ho last month aapke pass 101 call aayi thi 25 call miss ho gayi thi aapki.
Customer: Sari call aati hai sari hoti hai.
Executive: Nahi sir aapka call ka success rate na sir response ka 59% chal raha hai abhi. Thoda aap isko update kar lo kyunki call abhi jo pichle ek hafte ka hai wo 69% ka hai.
Customer: 69?
Executive: 59 yes call response rate.
Customer: Percent call aap miss mat karo ha 59% hai.
Executive: Kahan call nahi honge call.
Customer: Call aayegi aap lead manager pe jaoge na to lead manager pe recent call pe aap click karoge to waha missed call ka data dikhta hai incoming call ka bhi dikhta hai to aap missed aur recent ka ek baar check karo kitni call miss hui hai wo cheeze aap dekh lo sara aapko data waha dikh jayega visible ho jayega.
Customer: Thik hai mam sun raha hu mere pass dusra.
Executive: Haan aur apna product
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough genuine buyleads.

- Customer is not getting enough daily inquiries.

- Customer says promises made were not fulfilled.

- Customer says the catalog view is not effective.



Resolution:

- Executive reviewed the customer's concerns.

- Executive will check the customer's account.

- Executive asked for details of fake buyleads.

- Executive suggested focusing on updated customer details.

- Executive shared tips on using the platform effectively.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will message the customer on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog view, rating, inquiries
